explains: v. 调整（fine-tune 的 ing 形式）

sentences.en: The system is set up but it needs some fine-tuning.
sentences.cn: 该系统已装配好，但需要一些细小调整。

sentences.en: Such a degree of fine-tuning does not work in practice.
sentences.cn: 如此程度的微调在实践中行不通。

sentences.en: She said my understanding of Darwinism needed some fine-tuning.
sentences.cn: 她说我对进化论的理解需要一些微调。
